Headline: #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cicero Ave/Sunnyside
ShortDescription: NB 54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. buses are rerouted via Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee, Lawrence and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero Ave/Sunnyside.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee, Lawrence and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero Ave/Sunnyside.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
